explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a fraud detection method which is a typical application of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The method uses dual-channel memory networks, which are a type of deep learning architecture.
explanations.neural network: The proposed method involves neural networks, specifically memory networks.
explanations.memory network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of dual-channel memory networks for fraud detection.
explanations.classification: The final step of the method involves a classification network to determine financial fraud risk.
explanations.representation learning: The method encodes text data into semantic vectors, which is a form of representation learning.
explanations.feature representation: The method extracts graph features and text features, which are forms of feature representation.
explanations.pre-trained language models: The paper mentions the use of pre-trained language models to encode text data.
explanations.Large Language Model: Pre-trained language models are a type of large language model (LLM).
explanations.LLM: Pre-trained language models are a type of large language model (LLM).
